string-array.name: inter_one
string-array.item: He is my uncle.#She is my mother in law.#He is my nephew.#She is no relation to me.#Who is your mother\'s sister\'s husband? ______

Elephants are the largest land animals on Earth.#They travel in groups called herd.# Elephants are perhaps strongest animals, yet they are vegetarian.#There are indian and african elephants.#Which is CORRECT?
Nobody#Body#Anybody#Everybody #___knows how many stars there are in the universe.
I thought#I thinks#Did thought#Thought#____ I saw the president in the restaurant.
anyone#everyone#nobody#no one#Do you know anyone who has a helicopter? No, I don\'t know ______.
gone#put#made#had#I\'m sorry but he\'s already ______.
Yes, it\'s nine o\'clock; the post office should be open by now.#Yes, it\'s late. The others will must come by themselves.#Not still it\'s too early.#Let wait another half hour.#Shall we go? ______
needn\'t#will#don\'t#won\'t#You ______ shout! I\'m not deaf.
Yes, she can. She speaks Chinese very well.#Yes, she can speaks Chinese.#Yes, she cans.#She can speak the Chinese#Can she speak a foreign language? ______
What were you doing when I called?#Were where you at eight o\'clock?#Where was you during the rainstorm?#What you doing last night at eight?#______? I was taking a shower.
Nearly#Near to#Near of#Next to#________ every child in the school passed the swimming test.
satisfaction#satisfied#satisfactory#satisfactorily#She can look back on her career with great ________.
was#be#been#were#The captain as well as the passengers ________ frightened.
are#has#have#is#Ann has got two sisters. Both of them ________ married.
haven\'t met#didn\'t meet#do\'t meet#has meet#I _______ him for the past month.
you drink a lot#you would get fat#you must to be English#you become yourself drunk#If you drink a lot of beer, ______.
if I win the lottery#if I had won the lottery#if I won the lottery#if I will win the lottery#I will buy myself a sailboat and a bicycle ______.
there are many.#there is.#I like citrus kinds.#there is some.#Are there any kinds of fruit that you like? Yes, ______
Had I been born a woman,#I am man, not woman.#I\'d not have time to go at the bar or watch football on TV.#But I am not a woman, so that\'s not mine problem.#Which is CORRECT?
nothing#something#anything#thing#The refrigerator is empty; there\'s ______ inside.
had arrived, would have missed #would have arrived, would have missed #arrived, would have missed #would arrive, would miss #If he ____ one minute later, he_____ the train
was directed #was direct #did directed #directed #The film ________ by Quentin Tarantino
as soon as #until#unless#in case #I\'ll send it to you ________ I get the money
working, to have #working, having #to work, to have #to work, having #I spend too much time ________. I\'d like ________ more time for myself and my family.
been waiting #been waited #waiting#waited#How long have they ________ there?
have been working#have worked#worked#am working#Why are your hands so dirty? - Well, I ________ in the garden for the last two hours.
whose#which#who#that#Yes, that is the woman _______ horse almost trampled her!
I like spy novels.#Yes, I do.#No, I don\'t#I will#What kind of novels do you like?
I\'m a piano teacher.# I work every day.#I worked for two hours.#I worked for one hours.#What kind of work do you do?
About two hours.#In my living room.#I watch the news.#On Tuesday.#How many hours a day do you watch TV?

string-array.name: inter_two
string-array.item: down#to#through#at#The supermarket? Ah, yes: go ______ this road and turn right at the light.
How about some spaghetti?#Please, some soup?#You\'d like a dessert?#Would you like not some coffee?#______? Yes, I\'d like some.
I am not thinking#do not think#I are not thinking#don\'t think#Could you repeat the question please? I\'m sorry, ______ very clearly right now.

X squared plus Y cubed is one thousand seven hundred and ninety one.#X times X plus Y times Y times Y equals one seven nine one.#X for X and Y for Y for Y equals one thousand seven hundred and ninety one.#X to the second, plus Y to the third is one seven nine one.#How do you say this USING WORDS? (X x X) + (Y x Y x Y) = 1791
imagine#imagination#image#images#Try to ______ what it\'s like to be in a war.
gone#put#made#had#I\'m sorry but he\'s already ______.
Yes, it\'s nine o\'clock; the post office should be open by now.#Yes, it\'s late. The others will must come by themselves.#Not still it\'s too early.#Let wait another half hour.#Shall we go? ______
needn\'t#will#don\'t#won\'t#You ______ shout! I\'m not deaf.
Yes, she can. She speaks Chinese very well.#Yes, she can speaks Chinese.#Yes, she cans.#She can speak the Chinese#Can she speak a foreign language? ______
What were you doing when I called?#Were where you at eight o\'clock?#Where was you during the rainstorm?#What you doing last night at eight?#______? I was taking a shower.
such#like# same#like as#Professionals _______ as doctors and teachers should show social commitment.
who#whom#that#is#The doctor, _______ saw me in the morning, insisted that I should quit smoking.
anyone#no one#someone#everyone#I don\'t want to see _______.
where#which#what#whom#This is the house ______ I was born.
which#where#that#in which#The house _______ I was born in is made of clay.
had#have#has to#has got#The Rodriguez family ______ breakfast before leaving for the airport.
Were you#What you were#You were#Was you#______ thinking about your brother?
I was sleeping#I were sleeping#Was I sleeping#Were I sleeping#______ when the phone rang.
It was all right.#I did think it was a little boring.#I thank it was very good.#I thought it was prettily stupid.#What did you think of the show? ______
or#but#so that#when#America: love it ______ leave it.
Spain, Spanish #Spain, Spainese #Spanish, Spanish #Spanish, Spain #She\'s from ________, so she speaks ________
bigger, more expensive #bigger, expensiver #more big, more expensive #more big, expensiver #This house is ________, but also ________
in case #if#when#so as not to#Take a sandwich with you ________ you get hungry later
are you cooking? #are you cook? #do you cook? #do you cooking? #That smells good! What ________
twice a day #two times day #twice in day #two times for a day #I drink coffee ________
mine#my#the mine #of me #Whose bag is this? It\'s ________
had eaten #was eating #had been eating #has eaten #It was the first time he _____ anything so spicy
By Car#In Car#By The Car#On Car#How do you get to work? ____
Yes, I do#Yes, I Like#Yes, I Likes#Yes, I does#Do you like classical music?_____
is standing#is stand#stand#standing#Where is Mary? She ---- over there.

string-array.name: inter_three
string-array.item: had to#has to#must have#must#Eric ______ drive around for three hours before he found a parking place.
there are still many.#there are many of they.#there are very much.#they are many many days.#How many days are there until the year 2000? Oh, ___
She is my sister in law.#She the mother of my nephews.#He is her husband.#She is he kid\'s mother.#Who is your brother\'s wife? ______
Have you ever ridden a motorcycle before?#Did you ride a bicycle?#You have ridden a horse ever?#Rode you once a motorcycle?#____? Yes, I rode one once when I was younger.
at#forward#for#up#Don\'t look ______ the sun because it can hurt your eyes.
She wrote a letter to her best customer.#She told he about what you said.#She\'d not do anything at all.#She didn\'t know to do what.#What did Ms. Shen do? ______
had you already gained ten pounds?#asked you for a discount?#had you already seed Pamela\'s pants?#were you as fat you are now?#When you bought the pants, ______
got#has been#was#been#The bills ______ paid; what do you care who paid them?
gets#are#gotton#been#Nothing ______ done when the boss is away.
done#come#talked#looked#They\'ve ______ it already.
in#at#on #onto#His failure didn\'t bother him ________ the least.
such#so#much#much more#She is ________ a pretty girl.
many of#many#much#much of#________ the people invited to the party didn\'t turn up.
with#of#to#at#In accordance _________ your request, we are sending you some samples.
have ever seen#ever saw#have never seen#have ever saw#That is the best film I _______
dangered#dangerous#endanger#dangerously#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
waterish#watery#waters#watered#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
don\'t fix it#not repair it#leaving it alone#so don\'t fix it#If it works, ______.
He is my grandfather.#I am his son.#Yes, he is mine.#He is my father.#Who is your father\'s father? ______

We drank our coffee, smoked cigarettes and watched TV for an hour.#Yesterday, I got up later because I was tired.#At eleven, we finally get dressed.#Then we decided to go for a trip by the car.#Which is CORRECT?
hardly, hard #hard, hardly #hardly, hardly #hard, hard #He ________ ever works as ________ as he should
were#would be #am#was#I wouldn\'t say that to him if I ________ you
wouldn\'t be #didn\'t be #hadn\'t been #won\'t be #I wish he ________ so rude to people when we go out
slowly, fast #slowly, fastly #slow, fastly #slow, fast #He drives quite ________, but his brother drives really _____
going to #going#will#to#Do you think it\'s _____ rain tomorrow?
along#among#at#through#We drove ______ the river for ten kilometers but we didn\'t see any bridge.
myself#itself#really#very#Do you like my dress? I made it _____!
there are many on#are some on#are there many on#there are some to#Are there any good restaurants around here? Yes, ______ the highway.
I\'m the secretary.#I are a secretary.#I am my employee.#he is the president of them.#Are you the president of this company? No, ___
were they#you are been#are been#was#How long ______ in Spain on vacation last summer?

string-array.name: inter_four
string-array.item: down#to#through#at#The supermarket? Ah, yes: go ______ this road and turn right at the light.
Why do you put up with his stupid demands?#Why do you put up his stupid demands?#Why do you put with his stupid demands?#Why put you up with his stupid demands?#Which is CORRECT?
forgetment#forgotten#forgetful#forgettable#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
has got to#have to#would#can#Peter ______ take three exams before he graduates.

I haven\'t lost them; they\'re in my bag.#I have left them in the office yesterday.#I\'ve lost them yesterday.#I think I leaved them in the restaurant last night.#When did you lose your glasses? ______
bought#looked#sat#came#Mohammed ______ them yesterday.
run#manages#improved#managed#Mr. Suzuki is looking for someone to help him ______ his business.
could#shall#will#would#You look very tired; you ______ take a shower and freshen up if you like.
Yes, she can. She speaks Chinese very well.#Yes, she can speaks Chinese.#Yes, she cans.#She can speak the Chinese.#Can she speak a foreign language? ______
Yes, I will. Here you are.#No, thank you.#Okay, I will. When?#I\'m sorry, there is any sugar.#Will you get me some sugar please? ___
have you been#were#was#do#Where __________ all this while?
heard#listened#listened#heard to#Suddenly _______ a thud.
hear, was listening to#listen to, hearing#hear, listened to#listen to,hear#I didn\'t____ the knock because____the radio.
hear#listen#listen to#hear to#Please speak a bit louder. I cannot____you.
can hear#am hearing#can to here#can hearing#I_____somebody coming up the stairs.
We were going#We\'re goingWe\'re going#We was go#Were we going#_____ to school when we saw her.
writed#writer#writing #written#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
easen#easily#ease#easing#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
powerous#powerfully#powerful#powered#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
imagine#imagination#image#imagined#Try to ______ what it\'s like to be in a war.
the, the, an, a #a, the, an, the #the, the, a, a #a, a, the, the #Put ________ bag on ________ table, then give me ________ apple and ________ bar of chocolate
went#gone#goes#go#I ________ to Germany last year
today#before#yesterday#again#I\'ve already called her four times ________
can#could#might#may#Winters there ________ be really cold sometimes
lives#stays#live#living#She ________ in a small house near the park
to set #to fix #harden #hardening#I\'m sure I mixed the ingredients correctly, and yet the concrete refuses ______.
ought to #can#would#shouldn\'t#They really ______ change the oil in this truck; it\'s black as pitch.
there are many on#are some on#are there many on#there are some to#Are there any good restaurants around here? Yes, ______ the highway.
is worse.#worse is.#is worst.#is badder.#English grammar is the worst grammar of any language. No, it isn\'t. German grammar ______
My sister writes books.#She work in a factory.#She teaches to children English.#Works at the school.#What does your sister do? ____

string-array.name: inter_five
string-array.item: no one#someone#everyone#this one#Very good class, today ______ was late.
were you doing#was you doing#was do you#you were doing#What ______ when I called?
It was all right.#I did think it was a little boring.#I thank it was very good.#I thought it was prettily stupid.#What did you think of the show? ______
I put the coffee for you.#Go for it man!#What do you take me for? An idiot?#No doggy, this ice cream is not for you.#Which is NOT CORRECT?
getting in#get there#getting over#getting on#I\'m still not sure what time our plane\'s ______.
got#been#was#gotton#The bills ______ paid; what do you care who paid them?
myself#itself#really#very#Do you like my dress? I made it _____!
hasn\'t eaten#have not eaten#has eaten#doesn\'t eat#Roberto is hungry because he ______ anything yet today.
left#go#went#to depart#I\'m sorry but Ms. Pfeifer has already ______ for the day.
was watching#watched#have watched#are watching# I ______ TV when the telephone rang.
Listen carefully to#Hear carefully#Listen carefully#Hear carefully to#_____ what I am going to say.
shout#shouting#to shout#to shouting#I heard him_____at the watchman.
jump#to jump#jumping#to jumping#I saw her _______ into the pond.
explode#to explode#exploding#to exploding#I heard the bomb _____
swin#to swin#swimming#to swimming#I watched the kids _____in the pond.
done#talked#come#listened#They\'ve ______ it already.
avoiding#listening#looking#talking#Are you ______ me?
then Mary would drink whiskey #then Mary is a drunk #then Mary drank whiskey then Mary drank whiskey #then Mary will drink whiskey #If all Americans drank whiskey, and Mary was American, ______.
No, you cannot. Play outside. #No, you can. Go play outside. #Can\'t, but can play outside. #No, I cannot. #Mom, can I play football in my room? ______
beyond#throughout#at#over#Thomas isn\'t a good manager; he never plans ______ next week.
where the bus stop is #is where the bus stop #the bus stop is where #where is the bus stop #Could you tell me_____?
can\'t #don\'t #am not #not can #I\'m busy on Friday, so I _____ come
completely#very#incredibly#extremely#I was _____ exhausted by the end of the day
might have #must have #should have #can have #I don\'t know where she is. I suppose she ______ got stuck in traffic.
will have finished #will have been finishing #will finish #will be finishing #By next month I _____ all my exams, and I can relax!
stopped#stoped#stopping#stop#The radio contact with her airplane suddenly ______.
jumped#jumpped#jump#jumping#He ______ several inches farther than the German athlete.
made#make#makes#maked#In 1620, the Pilgrims ______ a difficult trip across the ocean from England.
ate#eat#eaten#eats#In those days, the pilgrims _______ (eat) deer, not turkey.
found#finds#finding#finded#He __ the weather and scenery he needed to finish his movie.

string-array.name: inter_six
string-array.item: already#yet#still#ever#I\'m afraid I\'m not hungry. I\'ve _______ eaten lunch.
some#any#a#one#Would you like _______ chicken?
had finished#finished#have finished#finishing#She ________ lunch by the time we arrived.
seeing#to see#see#going#What shall we do tonight? How about _________ a film?
Have ____ gone#Did____go#Have____go#Shall____go#_____ you ever ________ to Hollywood?
interested in#interested at#interesting in#interested for#Jack is really ____ history, especially Japanese history.
were#was#am#would be#If I ______ you, I would wait a while to begin investing.
arrives#will arrive#is arriving#is going to arrive.#He\'ll give you a call as soon as he ______.
as___as#so____than#as___than#so___as# I think San Francisco is ____ exciting ____ New York.
getting#to get#get#to getting#I could see him â€¦. on the bus.
repeated#repeating#repeat#to repeat# I heard my name ______several times.
there are many.#there is.#I like citrus kinds.#there is some.#Are there any kinds of fruit that you like? Yes, ______
Is they#much#gas#the Car?#Where is the ERROR? Is they much gas in the car?
He is my uncle.#She is my mother in law.#He is my nephew.#They are my aunts.#Who is your mother\'s sister\'s husband? ______
It\'s the largest city in the U.S.A. #Is a very, very big city. #It\'s sixteen million people big. #It have sixteen million people. #How big is New York? ______?
How much does Mrs. Park weigh? #What weight is Mrs. Park? #Which weight is Mrs. Park? #Weighs much Mrs. Park? #Choose the CORRECT QUESTION: ______? She\'s about seventy-five kilograms.
had you already heard about his son? #did he already leave for work? #had they telled you he was in jail? #was he in home? #When you called Dan, ______
understandation#understandibly#understood#understand #Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
sitten#sit#sitting#sitter#Which word form is NOT CORRECT?
No, not yet. #I\'ve went there often. #Yes, I did. #Yes, I gone yesterday. #Have you been to the new art museum? ______
if you touch it #because hot #if you had touched it #so not to touch it! #Fire burns ______.
have lived #lived#live#have been lived #I\'d love to _____ in the 19th Century
should have #must have #have to #ought have #That wasn\'t a good idea - you _____ thought about it more carefully
are#am#is#isn\'t#Where ______ they from?
don\'t#not#am not #doesn\'t#I _____ like getting up early
My mother\'s sister\'s daughter is my cousin. #She is my wife.#She my cousin.#Is my mother\'s niece.#Who is your mother\'s sister\'s daughter? ______
The movie was very long and very boring.#Was fantastic.#It was better then his first movie.#It was a action movie.#Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE:How was the movie last night? ______
through#under#in#across#The police went ______ all of Karl\'s things, but they didn\'t find any guns.
do you normally work#work you normally#are you normally working#you work normally#What hours ______? From nine to five, Monday through Friday.
who#where#what#how#_____ are you having dinner with? I\'m having dinner with Junko.

string-array.name: inter_seven
string-array.item: can\'t #shouldn\'t #mustn\'t #don\'t have to #But they ________be away - I saw them this morning!
having, living #having, live #to have, living #have, live #________ spent time abroad when I was a student, I found it easier to get used to ________ in another country
put off#put up#put onto#put away# Do you really want to __________ that meeting until tomorrow?
will#am going to#am#should#I\'m hungry! Just a moment, I______ make you a sandwich.
was going to#is going to#will come#wants#Jack told her that he ________ come the next day.
might have been#might has been#mustn\'t have been#couldn\'t have been#Where was Jack yesterday? - I don\'t know. He ________ seeing the doctor.
look after#look to#look at#look into# Would you like me to ________ the children next week?
had to#must#musted#has to#I missed the train, so I ______ take the next one.
She asks them if they slept well.#Every morning, Junko Kurosawa wake up early.#At the kitchen she greets her mother and father.#Then she sits down and drinks cup of tea.#Which is CORRECT?

Pasta is cheap, nutritious and easy to prepare.# Italy is famous for it\'s good food, fancy clothes and fast cars.#Everybody\'s heard of ferrari, the fastest car in the world.#Italian is expert at enjoying life.#Which is CORRECT?
anything#nothing#everything#other thing#How boring! This weekend I haven\'t done ______.
children#people#child#childes#What is the plural of "child"? ______
anybody#somebody#everybody#nobody#Ice skating is not so easy; not just ______ can learn to do it.
I want a hamburger. #I\'d like a beer. #Can I get some salad? #Could I have a cup of coffee? #Which is NOT POLITE?
up to#down#down to#up#What a lot of nerve! A man came ______ me in the street, and told me I shouldn\'t smoke!
get #be#become#was#How did this _____ broken?
would#want to #will#\'m going to #If I had more time, I _____ do more exercise
could have #might have #can have #may have #I ______ been hit by a car, but luckily I just managed to get out of the way
does#do#don\'t#is#Where ______ he work?
explain#say you#to say you#explain me# Let me ________! I didn\'t really want to eat all the cookies, I just couldn\'t help myself.
have been made#have been making#have made#are made#Fiestas ________ in Cologne, Germany for many years now.
anybody#nobody#everybody#somebody#Ice skating is not so easy; not just ______ can learn to do it.
I was sleeping#I were sleeping#I slept#Was I sleeping#___ when the phone rang.
get through#get by#get away#get up#I have so much work; I hope I can ______ it by Friday.
beautiful long black #long black beautiful #black long beautiful #long beautiful black #She\'s wearing a ________ dress
I like spy novels.#Yes, I do.#No, I don\'t#I will#What kind of novels do you like?
I\'m a piano teacher.# I work every day.#I worked for two hours.#I worked for one hours.#What kind of work do you do?
About two hours.#In my living room.#I watch the news.#On Tuesday.#How many hours a day do you watch TV?
Tuesday.#In the morning.#Every day.#Last week.#What is your busiest day of the week?
I agree with you.#I agree you.#I agree to you.#I agree for you.#My mother is a good cook.
